failure.message: AssertionError: expected [Your message successfully sent. Our manager will contact you in a few hours.] but found [We Do Who We Are Customers Say Get in Touch We are Creativitors of Web Mobile App explore We Do 01 Software Development Mobile Development Web Development Sharepoint Development Desktop Development 02 Design Business Analysis Consulting UI / UX Prototyping 03 Quality Assurance Performance Testing Test Automation QA Consulting and Management How We Do 01 Idea Our goal as software developers is helping our customers during all steps of development cycle, which usually starts with conceptualization of initial business idea, or in other words turning it into defined concept. This usually requires business and technical analysis. Our tech consultants will help to access feasibility, prepare project documentation, and suggest the best technology stack for project execution. The results of this work are resources that can be presented to potential investors or customers, and then to a development team. 02 UI / UX Design UI/UX designs are prototypes for the future product. They describe how the product will look and feel, and how users will interact with it. Creating such a prototype requires not only creativity and paint skills (artfulness), but also understanding of business processes, awareness about best industry practices and specific to platform guidelines, as well as technical knowledge. Professionally made UI/UX design will reduce efforts needed for development and improve predictability of final results. 03 Development Once designs are ready and all the specs are defined, we can move on to the actual development stage. There can be different approaches and methodologies here, but for most of the cases we prefer and highly recommend iterative approach, with splitting the full project into smaller iterations - milestones. After each milestone customer, will be able to see and try a piece of a functional and tested program. Such approach allows delivering maximum business value fast and helps controlling risks 04 Release / Deployment After any software product was created it does not bring value until it became available for end-users. For different types of software there are different ways of providing such availability: mobile apps get published to app stores, websites are being hosted on a server, and desktop applications are delivered via executable files. Nowadays releases are not a single time event, but rather a constant process which needs to be properly configured. And we know how to do it. 05 Support Technologies and environments tend to change rapidly. That’s why software products require additional attention after release to keep up with new realities. We can offer custom support plans which will allows your organization to stay flexible and prepared to unexpected situations. Who We Are 14 years 300+ satisfied customers UA Lviv DE Munich 20 team members Customers Say “ I was impressed by their attention to detail and willingness to treat this project as their own. They kept me updated on their progress, sent me screenshots until a trial was ready, and let me test the product and give feedback every step of the way. They went above and beyond my expectations. I'm so happy that I selected them. It was the right choice. Debby Sibert, President & CEO, Ultimately Essential “ As a result of their involvement, more leads have come to the site. ArtfulBits’ not only provided implementable suggestions but also worked quickly and efficiently. There were no major issues nor delays. Julien Guyot, CTO of Green Acres “ We expected just a professional developer, but we wound up with a team of advisers and consultants as well. ArtfulBits demonstrates in-depth knowledge and broad experience in their field. We’ve utilized their expertise in every stage of the project so far. Shawn Groce, Founder of Wesa Get in Touch Name Email Company Name (optional) Website (optional) Tell Us About Your Requirements Your message successfully sent. Our manager will contact you in a few hours. send Contact Ukraine, Lviv +38 (032) 242 07 86 office@artfulbits.com Germany, Munich +49 (0) 89 381 56 3200 info@artfulbits.de Map data ©2019 Google Terms of Use 00 01 02 03 04 05]
